Jokowi Sebut Harga Gas Industri di RI Mahal
01 Nov 2019, 09:48 by Marlinda Oktavia Erwanti


Foto: Andhika Prasetia/detikcom

Jakarta - Presiden Joko Widodo (Jokowi) menyebut harga gas industri di Indonesia lebih mahal jika dibandingkan di negara lain. Dirinya pun meminta Menteri Energi dan Sumber Daya Mineral (ESDM) mengecek penyebabnya.Jokowi meminta dicarikan biang kerok yang membuat harga gas industri di Indonesia kemahalan."Saya sudah menyampaikan kepada Menteri ESDM kemarin agar betul-betul yang namanya harga gas itu dilihat lagi. Beban-beban mana yang menyebabkan harga itu menjadi sebuah angka yang kalau dilihat oleh industri di negara-negara lain, harga kita ini terlalu mahal," kata Jokowi di Kompleks Istana Kepresidenan, Jakarta, Jumat (1/11/2019).Menurut Mantan Walikota Solo itu bisa saja penyebab mahalnya harga gas industri karena harga sewa pipa dari sumur produksi ke kawasan industri, misalnya dari sumur gas di Dumai menuju Jawa."Apakah harga sewa pipa gas itu terlalu mahal? Bisa saja di situ. Karena data yang saya miliki, harga gas di offshore masih normal. Begitu ditarik ke industri, ditarik ke sebuah area ekonomi itu kok lebih mahal, ada di mana, makanya saya suruh cek," jelasnya.Jokowi pun heran kenapa harga gas industri di Indonesia bisa sampai US$ 9-US$ 11 per MMBTU, sementara harga di offshore masih normal."Dilihat secara detail betul ini yang menyebabkan harganya kok sampai US$ 9 sampai US$ 11, dari mana. Hitung-hitungannya dari mana. Di offshore-nya harganya sekian kok setelah ke pengguna, ke user bisa jadi angkanya setinggi gitu," ungkapnya.Di samping itu, menurutnya penting industri yang berhubungan dengan gas agar lokasinya dekat dengan sumur-sumur gas yang ada. Harapannya itu bisa membuat harga gas tidak semahal sekarang."Ini harus kita desain lagi kawasan industri yang khusus membutuhkan gas memang harus didekatkan dengan sumur-sumur yang ada," tambahnya.Simak Video "Pakar Nilai Alasan Jokowi Belum Keluarkan Perppu Mengada-ada"[Gambas:Video 20detik](toy/eds)

Jokowi Mentioned the Price of Industrial Gas in RI Expensive
Nov 1, 2019, 09:48 by Marlinda Oktavia Erwanti


Photo: Andhika Prasetia / detikcom

Jakarta - President Joko Widodo (Jokowi) said the price of industrial gas in Indonesia is more expensive when compared to other countries. He also asked the Minister of Energy and Mineral Resources (ESDM) to check the cause. Jokowi asked for a culprit that made the price of industrial gas in Indonesia expensive. "I have told the Minister of Energy and Mineral Resources yesterday that the name of the gas price is really seen again. "Which burden causes the price to be a number that if seen by industry in other countries, our price is too expensive," Jokowi said at the Presidential Palace Complex, Jakarta, Friday (11/01/2019). According to the Former Mayor of Solo that could be the reason for the high price of industrial gas because the price of renting pipes from production wells to industrial areas, for example from gas wells in Dumai to Java. gas offshore is still normal. Once drawn to the industry, drawn to an economic area, how come it's more expensive, where is it, so I told him to check, "he explained. Jokowi was surprised why the price of indu stri in Indonesia can be up to US $ 9-US $ 11 per MMBTU, while offshore prices are still normal. "Seen in detail this is really what causes the price to US $ 9 to US $ 11, from where. Calculate from where. In the offshore the price is really high after the user, the user could be the number as high, "he said. Besides, according to him, it is important for the gas-related industry to be located close to existing gas wells. Hopefully it can make gas prices not as expensive as now. "We have to design again an industrial area that specifically needs gas, indeed it must be brought closer to existing wells," he added.
